mapper.select: SELECT p.`id`, p.`name`, p.`description`, p.`create_time` FROM `sys_permission` p, `sys_role_permission` rp, `sys_role` r WHERE p.`id` = rp.`permission_id` AND r.`id` = rp.`role_id` AND r.`id` IN ( SELECT r.`id` FROM `sys_role` r, `sys_user` u, `sys_user_role` ur WHERE r.`id` = ur.`role_id` AND u.`id` = ur.`user_id` AND u.`id` = #{id})
SELECT r.`id`, r.`name`, r.`description`, r.`create_time` FROM `sys_role` r, `sys_user` u, `sys_user_role` ur WHERE r.id = ur.`role_id` AND u.id = ur.`user_id` AND u.`id` = #{id}
SELECT id, name, description, create_time FROM `sys_permission` WHERE `id` IN ( SELECT permission_id FROM `sys_role_permission` WHERE `role_id` = #{id} )
